name: Deepdish Deeptopia
description:
In Deepdish Deeptopia, you are a little pizzabot starting it's job at Deeper and Deaper's pizza!

Your task is to cut up all the ingredients so that the restaurant can make the deepest pizza in all of Deeptopia!

This game was a solo project made entirely in Unity in roughly 30h of work (10 per jam day) but uses music from bensound.org. No sound effects are present unfortunately. Planned timer for the levels wasn't implemented in time.

Credits: Chris Bodsworth (campfiregames.co.uk)
